statements: SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT id, amount, transaction_type FROM financial_transactions WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT id, transaction_time, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT id, amount, transaction_type FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, amount, transaction_type FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_time >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_time <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT id, amount, transaction_type FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, account_id, transaction_type FROM financial_transactions WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY transaction_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount < 500 AND transaction_type = 'Withdrawal' ORDER BY transaction_time ASC;
SELECT id, amount, transaction_type FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE account_id = 98765 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT merchant, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE is_fraud = TRUE;
SELECT description, event FROM security_logs WHERE user_id = 54321 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE merchant='Amazon' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date, merchant FROM financial_transactions WHERE is_fraud = TRUE AND amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, merchant FROM financial_transactions WHERE account_id IN (123, 456, 789) ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, recipient_id FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-03';
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-10';
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, log_date FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, recipient_id FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Credit' ORDER BY amount DESC;

SELECT ft.transaction_id, ft.transaction_date, ft.amount, st.flagged_date FROM financial_transactions ft JOIN suspicious_transactions st ON ft.transaction_id = st.transaction_id WHERE ft.amount > 5000 ORDER BY st.flagged_date ASC;

SELECT ft.transaction_id, tl.log_date, tl.log_details FROM financial_transactions ft LEFT JOIN transaction_logs tl ON ft.transaction_id = tl.transaction_id WHERE tl.log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Debit';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions_history WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT account_id, account_type, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_id, sum(amount) as total_amount FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_id IN (SELECT account_id FROM accounts WHERE account_balance < 0);

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.transaction_date, c.client_name FROM financial_transactions t JOIN clients c ON t.account_id = c.client_id WHERE c.client_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY t.transaction_date ASC;

SELECT th.transaction_id, th.transaction_type, th.transaction_date, th.transaction_amount FROM transactions_history th WHERE th.transaction_status = 'pending' AND th.transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY th.transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT card_number, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT log_id, log_date, log_message, severity FROM security_logs WHERE severity = 'High' LIMIT 10;
